title: "Are robots really coming to take your job?"
excerpt: "The result is that workers now fear that their jobs will be taken by robots. While automation in many industries, such as car manufacturing, isn’t new, research from Oxford Economics, released in 2019, suggested that machines are expected to take over about 20 million manufacturing jobs globally over the next decade."
